评论概述: Hands down favorite sweater i've ever owned
评论详情: This sweater fits nice, doesn't give a big poof in the stomach, arm sleeves are so soft and the color I chose was so cute! This is my favorite sweater i've ever gotten, and trust me I can be picky. Worth the money, I try hard to not wear it multiple days in a row because no joke its amazing. I'm 5'10 165 lbs.
This sweater is soft/comfy and thick enough for cold weather. It keeps me warm. The fit is flattering and true to size. Good quality.

I have had a couple colors for over 2 years now and they have shrunk a little but just avoid the dryer if you don’t want this to happen. These are nice, thick, and warm! The sleeves have a bit of fuzzies now under the pit area mostly but that’s easy to fix! It’s not often you come across women’s clothing that is good quality for a great price! Don’t skip out on these for your self, your bestie, or your wife/girlfriend(put a ring on it)

评论概述: Beautiful sweater but noticed mine has a defect the first time I wore it...
评论详情: Beautiful sweater that fits great. I'm so bummed because I bought this on sale in July and now that its finally cold enough the first time I wear it it has some kind of snag causing a dark line through the front of the sweater and the string has pulled out. :( The sweater is thick and warm and I love the color, so super sad this happened! I normally wear size medium but sized up on this for a perfect oversize fit.  The seller did reach out and refund for the sweater that got snagged - I plan on ordering again because it truly is such a great quality, fit, and color, I think I just got unlucky.
Many times when buying online the color of the product surprises you. Not with this sweater. It’s a bright blue just like the photo. Very cute style and soft!
I love this sweater. The quality is amazing! The fabric is very soft! The cable knit arms are a nice touch! I would highly recommend!

Sweater is very soft! Flattering fit! Size up if you want more of an oversized, not fitted, style. I typically wear a large and went to XL based on other reviews and I’m very glad I did! Super comfortable and cute!
Love the fit and look of this sweater. After trying it on I bought another one in a different color.

Overall, good quality. Ordered size small in wine and pink - could have gone up in size to medium for a more oversized/loose/longer fit in the body and sleeves. After multiple washes, minimal shrinkage. Typically, like to let it air dry. vs. putting in the dryer. Versatile with jeans, leggings, skirts, etc. Shipping was seamless and would recommend.

评论概述: A bit short in the torso but pretty
评论详情: I bought 3 colors and I really like the sweaters. Definitely a bit short in the torso so if you like longer sweaters this is not for you. If your arms go up your middle section is showing so just be prepared for that. Pretty colors and all true to size and color shown in the photos. I have not washed them yet so not sure how they hold up. Let’s hope they don’t shrink in the middle or they will be donated quickly.
It’s very soft and comfortable. The cost was great.
Good quality sweater. I will be able to wear the sweater this fall and will be perfect for winter with a top coat. Very versatile sweater.

For reference, I am 5’4, 180 pounds, 42 D and ordered the XL which is my usual top size. It fits loose but not in a way that looks sloppy. Order up a size if you want over size rather than loose. The fabric is soft. The sweater is a medium weight so probably good to keep you comfortable into the 50s (F). This would be good for anything from office casual days to weekend relaxing. You can dress it up or down with accessories. I bought it in the golden yellow and will be ordering in more colors.

评论概述: comfy and  stylish....for my diva sister
评论详情: This mustard-colored sweater is an epitome of comfort and style. Crafted from soft materials, it embraces you in warmth while adding a vibrant pop to your wardrobe. Its stylish design effortlessly elevates any outfit, making it a versatile piece for both casual and semi-formal occasions. Whether paired with jeans for a relaxed look or layered over a dress for added flair, this sweater is a must-have staple for any fashion-forward individual.
